summary: A British secret service agent is faced with the task of pursuing and eliminating a British-born suicide bomber and his terrorist cell.
cast: Sean Bean|Charlotte Rampling|Abhin Galeya|Tom Burke|Tuppence Middleton|Peter Polycarpou|Silas Carson|James Fox|Michelle Ryan|Sam Douglas|Tariq Jordan|Chris Ryman|Glenn Wrage|Mens-Sana Tamakloe|Shivaani Ghai|Shane Zaza|Chris Geere|Simon Wright|Sid Mitchell|Rebecca Egan|Robin Hellier|Martin Muncaster|Mark Eccleston|Stephen Bray|Jeetandra Lathigra|Charlotte Lucas|Brian Dykes|Philip Hutson|Chips Henderson|Crispin Corfe|Henry Maddicott|Natalie Jones|Roy McKenzie|Marcel McKenzie|Quill Roberts|Tanya Edworthy|Nicholas Gecks|Kiyani Aziz|Gioacchino Jim Cuffaro|Craig Davis|Willow De La Roche|Rochelle De-Terville|Michael Eaves|Thomas Finney|Jensen Freeman|Richard Goss|James Helder|Phoenix James|Todd Von Joel|Steven Kwon|Shaun Lucas|Jonathan Nyati|Gino Picciano|Chris Pollard|Raman Rai|Adam Robinson|Baz Salam|Alison Scott|Kirsty Seager|Brian Shaw|Marcus Sinclair|Mick Slaney|Jon Wennington|Amy Wiles|Elisha Willett|Chris Wilson
title: Amenaza terrorista
